attributes.action: Allow only eu migrants who worked & paid tax for at least 75% of time in the UK
attributes.background: Vote to allow only EU Migrants that have paid their way in the UK economy by working and paying taxes for at least 75% of their time in the UK, this will allow the valued migrants security and weed out the freeloaders who are only here for free handouts.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
